WorkItem.ClosedComment: Out of Date, we don't use a pull-down anymore
WorkItem.Description:
When running Rawr 3 on a Mac, the Filter pull-down doesn't give any options. The pull-down comes up but is completely blank. This is true whether running in FireFox, Safari, or outside of the browser. The same version of Rawr, when run in the same version of FireFox on Windows XP, displays the Filter options correctly.
 
Steps to Reproduce:
 
1. Launch Rawr 3
2. Load a character (mine is attached, but any character will do)
3. Select the Filter pull-down
4. Observe that there is no visible content in the pull-down
 
Additional Information:
 
Mac OS 10.6.3
Rawr version in "About Rawr" shows as 1.0, but this is the latest 3.0 beta
FireFox 3.6.3 or Safari 5.0 (6533.16)
